an5.175:4.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca.
an5.175:4.5: kotūhalamaṅgaliko hoti, maṅgalaṃ pacceti no kammaṃ;
an5.175:4.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca.
an5.175:5.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīkañca.
an5.175:5.5: akotūhalamaṅgaliko hoti, kammaṃ pacceti no maṅgalaṃ;
an5.175:5.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīkañcā”ti.
